en-US.summary: Twicken's Calculator for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
examplePhrases: Alexa tell my calculator to subtract 10 from 95.
Alexa ask my calculator to perform division.
Alexa, tell my calculator to add two numbers.
en-US.name: My Calculator
en-US.description: This is a calculator created by Twicken as a learning tool for creating Alexa skills. It performs addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
